title: Between The Scenes - Trevor Responds to Criticism from the French Ambassador
itunes:title: Between The Scenes - Trevor Responds to Criticism from the French Ambassador
description:
Trevor responds to a letter from French ambassador Gérard Araud criticizing him for congratulating Africa on France’s World Cup victory.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
